item.title: [Ongoing] 3D Printing Technology Capability Map
item.description: Who are we? Lana I am a Ph.D. candidate from CIVL Department, HKUST. My current research focuses on the construction 3D printing industry. In addition to English, I can speak in Russian as well as Mandarin which I have been learning for several years. What do we want to make? 3D printing technologies emerges as a breakthrough in the construction industry and attracts much attention from industry experts and academics.
